member.name: T:CSEx.Guests.ARM.ARMGuestState
member.summary: ARM 32-bit guest CPU state representation. Corresponds to VexGuestARMState in original VEX.

member.name: F:CSEx.Guests.ARM.ARMGuestState.RegisterMap
member.summary: Register name to offset mapping for ARM

member.name: M:CSEx.Guests.ARM.ARMGuestState.GetPC
member.summary: Helper to extract the PC value (without Thumb bit)

member.name: M:CSEx.Guests.ARM.ARMGuestState.IsThumbMode
member.summary: Helper to check if processor is in Thumb mode

member.name: M:CSEx.Guests.ARM.ARMGuestState.SetPC(System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Helper to set PC and Thumb mode

member.name: T:CSEx.Guests.ARM.ARMLifter
member.summary: Placeholder for ARM guest lifters This will contain ARM32 and ARM64 instruction lifting logic (~22,220 lines for ARM32 + ~13,501 lines for ARM64 from original VEX)
